${ModID}:Ignition.NAME: Ignition
${ModID}:Ignition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Blaze.

${ModID}:DualBlade.NAME: Dual Blade
${ModID}:DualBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your next Orb twice.

${ModID}:Winterwisp.NAME: Winterwisp
${ModID}:Winterwisp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Polar. NL If it filled an empty Orb slot, trigger its passive.

${ModID}:FrozenMagma.NAME: Frozen Magma
${ModID}:FrozenMagma.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${ModID}:Polar. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Blaze. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FrozenMagma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${ModID}:Polar. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Blaze.

${ModID}:Consolidate.NAME: Consolidate
${ModID}:Consolidate.DESCRIPTION: Remove your first 2 Orbs. NL Gain 1 Focus.
${ModID}:Consolidate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove your first Orb. NL Gain 1 Focus.

${ModID}:FrostConversion.NAME: Frost Conversion
${ModID}:FrostConversion.DESCRIPTION: If you have 3+ unique Orbs, Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 Frost.
${ModID}:FrostConversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have 3+ unique Orbs, Channel 1 Frost and trigger its passive. NL Channel 1 Frost.

${ModID}:Fluctuate.NAME: Fluctuate
${ModID}:Fluctuate.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL If you have 3+ unique Orbs, apply !M! more.

${ModID}:VoidEngine.NAME: Void Engine
${ModID}:VoidEngine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
${ModID}:VoidEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Add a Void to your discard pile.

${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.NAME: Chaos Generator
${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! random Orb.
${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! random Orbs.
